patthana1.15:1.1_0: Hīnaṁ dhammaṁ paṭicca hīno dhammo uppajjati hetupaccayā—hīnaṁ ekaṁ khandhaṁ paṭicca tayo khandhā …pe…
patthana1.15:2.1_0: Hīnaṁ dhammaṁ paṭicca majjhimo dhammo uppajjati hetupaccayā—hīne khandhe paṭicca cittasamuṭṭhānaṁ rūpaṁ.
patthana1.15:3.1_0: Hīnaṁ dhammaṁ paṭicca hīno ca majjhimo ca dhammā uppajjanti hetupaccayā—hīnaṁ ekaṁ khandhaṁ paṭicca tayo khandhā cittasamuṭṭhānañca rūpaṁ …pe…
patthana1.15:4.1_0: Majjhimaṁ dhammaṁ paṭicca majjhimo dhammo uppajjati hetupaccayā—majjhimaṁ ekaṁ khandhaṁ paṭicca tayo khandhā cittasamuṭṭhānañca rūpaṁ …pe…
patthana1.15:4.1_6: mahābhūte paṭicca cittasamuṭṭhānaṁ rūpaṁ kaṭattārūpaṁ upādārūpaṁ.
patthana1.15:5.1_0: Paṇītaṁ dhammaṁ paṭicca paṇīto dhammo uppajjati hetupaccayā … tīṇi.
patthana1.15:6.1_0: Majjhimañca paṇītañca dhammaṁ paṭicca majjhimo dhammo uppajjati hetupaccayā— paṇīte khandhe ca mahābhūte ca paṭicca cittasamuṭṭhānaṁ rūpaṁ.
patthana1.15:7.1_0: Hīnañca majjhimañca dhammaṁ paṭicca majjhimo dhammo uppajjati hetupaccayā— hīne khandhe ca mahābhūte ca paṭicca cittasamuṭṭhānaṁ rūpaṁ.
